fixed my problem. for all:
when loading screen freeze after you select new game , go to extras ingame, then set the dialoglanguage to english. you can select the text in german english french italian. but dialog only english.

Okay i m getting installation errors, as same as some other folks who downloaded it. but as i have noticed there is nothing "corrupt" in any of those.bin files i downloaded(as it shows in the error message). Becoz first when i tried installing from the root setup. the error appeared in 13.5% of installation. Then i thought yeah might be my AV or something blocking the installation? i switched to safe mode and tried installing from there now the curious thing is i installed awesomely till 73% and got another "writing error" now, when i hit retry it started from 0% again. I m very sure this is something happened to me earlier (don't remember which game i downloaded faced the same issue tho). But yeah i have faced this kind of issue earlier while installing a large size game from torrents. Any one who can find a solution for this will be much appreciated :)

SOLVED :D

Actually the .bin files are not corrupt, it was the "setup.exe" in the root directory! so folks who are having this installation issues use the Setup.exe inside the "Disk 1" folder 

Thanks for this awesome upload!
